=E2=80=9CThen Prime, I go to go... Call us when you have som=
ething we have to take a lead=E2=80=9Dhissed Hydre while he retreat and ope=
ned his om link to all predacons=E2=80=9DTime to go home, we have an Import=
an meeting to attend=E2=80=9Dthen he send a encoded comlink to Scourge =E2=
=80=9CTry to place a traking device in the baby prime... if Only you have a=
 chance=E2=80=9D

Hydras typed a encode message to Cryotek =E2=80=9CFind me=
 in my base this are the coordinates... we have stuff to discuss=E2=80=9D H=
ydras send with the message the coordinates.

*****************************=
*****
Talon look at Tucson said =E2=80=9CDo you think that Unicron are behi=
nd this? and another significant thing: Why Rodimus didnt attemped to captu=
re Elita?

*********************************
Elita sobbed and said =E2=80=
=9CI want to go home=E2=80=9D

Tucson nods in assurance.

" Just as I suspec=
ted.  Completely Alien.  Thank you Hydras, I am going to bring Noctorro bac=
k to the Ark for repairs, and I will then carry out the rest of my investig=
ation with Talon.  As soon as we find anything we will notify you."

He tur=
ns to Talon, with a heavy sigh.

" I'm not so sure if Rodimus will be able =
to recover his leadership after this round of repossession.  He's far too v=
ulnerable to attack."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

g 15, 2011, at 9:49 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:
